author: barnabasbusa
content: seems like you might be targetting non main branch ?

author: barnabasbusa
content: This config you posted with latest main branch is working just fine : `kt run github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package --args-file test.yaml --image-download always --verbosity detailed`
